TypeSignature.Value: public delegate IntPtr GRSharpVkGetProcedureAddressDelegate(string name, Instance instance, Device device);
.class public auto ansi sealed GRSharpVkGetProcedureAddressDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The name of the Vulkan procedure to retrieve.
The SharpVk Vulkan instance, or for global functions.
The SharpVk Vulkan device, or for instance-level functions.
Docs.summary: Represents a method that retrieves Vulkan procedure addresses using SharpVk types.
Docs.returns: A pointer to the requested Vulkan procedure, or if not found.
